right.name: invite
right.desc: automatically add meeting invites from grantee to the target's calendar. e.g. (1) When user Y is invited to a meeting, an appointment is added to his calendar automatically(tentatively) only if invite is from A, B, C or anyone in group G. (2) Conf room Y can only be booked by users A, B, C and group G.

right.name: loginAs
right.desc: login as another user. Currently this is only honored for imap/pop3 login

right.name: sendAs
right.desc: reply to messages in a shared folder as the owner of the folder
